caption.p: Schedule of Enrolment, Interventions, and Assessments Recommended Follow-up Schedule Protocol^

table-wrap-foot.p: ^The follow-up schedule is based on current recommended routine practice. A window period of +/− 2 weeks is allowed for the 1st month follow up visit. +/− 1 month is allowed for the 3rd, 6th and 12th month follow-up visit. It is advised that this be followed for standardisation of records, however individual deviations will be allowed. +MRI Brain imaging if performed following surgery should be done 2-weeks post op. MRI is recommended for follow-up brain imaging but contrasted-CT scan is allowed
